adrFormatAddress: 55 Water St, New York, NY 10041, USA

originalText.text: This company is the absolute worst. I used them for a commercial insurance policy years ago and they sent me an audit this past year which was very time consuming (especially for a policy that expired 3 years ago) further more a legal notice came in to appear for a claim that was filed with them back in 2020 which they should have defended my company over since it was covered under their policy. Anyway they took 4 weeks to get back to me on whether or not they were going to represent my company at the hearing and they literally left me waiting until hours before the hearing to tell me whether or not they were going to represent our company in court. I've been dealing with insurance companies for 20 years and never have I had people blatantly lie to me and utterly disrespect me by promising answers by specific times and then never hearing back from them. You can do better than this company even if they are saving you money it's not worth it.

originalText.text: This company is the worse! Do not get a policy under this company. My home had damage to my roof and drain spouts from hail and wind storms, and a leak from the roof into my kitchen. I had several contractors come out and say that the leak came from the roof but QBE refuses to acknowledge this. The field adjuster said one thing to me in person but then put something different in his report which downplayed the damages. The desk adjuster has been ignoring my calls and emails. I have a huge hole in my kitchen ceiling for the last two months that probably wont get fixed anytime soon under the claim. They take your money every month but refuse to honor your claims. Shame on QBE!

originalText.text: This insurance company is borderline crooks. Adjusters doesn't answer calls or email. They don't honor the insurance policy. Cheap but not worth it.

text.text: This insurance company is borderline crooks. Adjusters doesn't answer calls or email. They don't honor the insurance policy. Cheap but not worth it.

originalText.text:
Following a hail storm, with significant roof and siding damage, we filed a claim with QBE. At first the company seemed eager to help process our claim. They were fast, had someone out to inspect damages. Sadly, their adjuster didn't write up our roof and siding damage into one report. We received our first check for the roof damage. After contacting QBE and requesting the siding be addressed QBE initially stated the claim was resolved (closed). Our contractor even addressed the issue to explain the siding damage was in part due to the same storm, their adjuster was even aware of this. Eventually they covered the siding damage. 3 months ago we receive a letter that QBE is no longer covering homes in New Jersey.
Here comes the headache. We go online and start calling other insurance companies to find new coverage. Our rates are triple! Why? QBE filed 2 separate claims for one hail storm and now we are being punished by all other Insurance carriers! Triple the cost? QBE is not who you want covering your assets. QBE made mistakes with our claim and now we are stuck (on a post covid economy/budget like most Americans) trying to correct QBE's mistake.
I am currently trying to correct the issue (my wife has tried for hours on the phone).
Hopefully someone within QBE will correct their error and this headache will cease to exist.
I will update this review with a conclusion later but for now I Do Not Recommend that anyone chooses QBE for homeowners insurance.

originalText.text: I used residentshield for renter's insurance which is under QBE - do NOT get a policy with them. I was on hold for almost an hour and then when I finally get to someone, the person was very rude, cut me off mid-sentence constantly, tried to think/tell me he knows more about my apartment lease than I do, and then hung up on me. All without ever answering my question / solving my problem. If this is how they treat customers asking a simple question, I cannot imagine how much worse it will be if a customer has to file a claim and needs to get a hold of them. Absolutely disgusted with his behavior, do not waste your time or money here.
